comment.author: 36083067@N04
comment._content: Malietoa was not a "king" as we understand it; this is in a colonial context in which imperial powers wanted to create a king.

comment.author: 59393044@N06
comment._content: whats the difference with the tripartite agreement and the berlin treaty? which one seperated the samoan islands?

comment.author: 36083067@N04
comment._content: Tripartite Convention of 1899 divided Samoa - and gave the Solomon Islands to Britain and created the Caprivi Strip in German Southwest Africa. The Berlin Treaty was in 1889
